title: ethernetServiceDetailItemRequest
description: Details of an ethernet service. These details are used for Serviceability Requests.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Ethernet Service Detail.

interfaceType.description: The type of interface the service being detailed should be delivered over (e.g., Optical, Electrical).

accessMedium.description: The type of media the service being detailed should delivered over (e.g. FIBER, COAX, TWISTED_PAIR).

classOfService.description: The desired Class of Service, as defined by MEF 23.1.

pricingTerm.description: The length of the service contract in months

activationDate.description: The desired activation date for the service.

objectType.description: Identifies the specific type of object being represented. In this case, ethernetServiceDetailItemRequest.

enniRequired.description: Indicates if a new NNI needs to be established for this service.

enniRef.description: A reference to the NNI that will be utilized for this service. This will generally be a Circuit ID. The circuit identifier that the buyer uses to refer to the existing ENNI that is to be used to support this service.

enniLocation.description: Location/address of the NNI that will be utilized for this service.
